faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.q1: How do I find exams for a specific course or instructor?
faq.a1: You can use the search bar and filter options on the 'Exams' page. Simply type in the course code (e.g., 'CSE-101') or the instructor's name and select the desired semester or year to narrow down the results.
faq.a2: When viewing an exam question, you can click the 'Get AI Explanation' button. Our AI will provide a detailed, step-by-step breakdown of the solution, helping you understand the underlying concepts, not just the final answer.
faq.q3: Is it free to use the Manara?
faq.a3: Yes! We offer a free 'Basic' plan that allows you to browse all materials and get a limited number of AI explanations per month. For unlimited access and advanced features, you can upgrade to our Pro or Premium plans.
faq.q4: Can I contribute my own study materials?
faq.a4: Absolutely! We encourage students to contribute. You can use the 'Add Exam' or 'Add Project' sections to upload your materials. This helps grow the repository and benefits the entire Abu Dhabi University community.
faq.q5: Is my personal data and uploaded content secure?
faq.a5: Yes. We prioritize your privacy and security. Your personal information is protected, and you have full control over the content you upload. Our platform is built with modern security standards to keep your data safe.

footer.tagline: The ultimate academic companion for Abu Dhabi University students.
